  • Method Details

    • writeScore

      public void writeScore​(java.lang.String name, int points)
      Function that write the inputted names and scores in text files for further display.
      Parameters:
      name - Writes the names in the text files using BufferedWriter.
      points - Writes the scores in the text files using BufferedWriter.

    • readNamesandScores

      public void readNamesandScores()
      Reads the names from the stored text file for displaying in the Scores section. Reads the scores from the stored text file for displaying in the Scores section.

    • padRight

      public java.lang.String padRight​(java.lang.String s, int n)
      A Right indented formatted string is returned without additional spaces.
      Parameters:
      s - String that should be formatted and padded in the space accordingly.
      n - number of spaces that should be added to the right.
      Returns:
      String after formatted and padded without additional spaces.

    • padLeft

      public java.lang.String padLeft​(java.lang.String s, int n)
      A Left indented formatted string is returned without additional spaces.
      Parameters:
      s - String that should be formatted and padded in the space accordingly.
      n - number of spaces that should be added to the left.
      Returns:
      String after formatted and padded without additional spaces.

    • setScoreVBox

      public void setScoreVBox()
      Sets the Scores Box to display the player in Scores section.

    • getScoreVBox

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox getScoreVBox()
      Gets the VBox scoreContainer.
      Returns:
      scoreContainer from setScoreVBox()
